item.title: 诺和诺德股价创 9 个月新低，因 2025 年指导计划受挫
item.description: 丹麦制药商诺和诺德（Novo Nordisk）的股价在前一个交易日大涨超过8%后，周四创下了9个多月来的新低，原因是明年的业绩指引令人失望，给其广受欢迎的减肥药Wegovy的强劲销售增长蒙上了阴影。【原文：Danish drugmaker Novo Nordisk's shares hit an over 9-month low on Thursday after surging more than 8% the previous day, as underwhelming guidance for next year overshadowed strong sales growth for its popular Wegovy weight-loss drug.】

item.title: Tapestry 因 Tabby 手袋需求强劲而上调年度盈利目标
item.description: Tapestry 周四上调了年度盈利目标，第一季度收入超出市场预期，原因是 Coach 母公司受益于其流行的 Tabby 手袋的全价销售。【原文：Tapestry raised its annual earnings target and topped market expectations for first-quarter revenue on Thursday, as the Coach parent benefited from full-prices sales of its popular Tabby handbags.】

item.title: 由于护肤品销售低迷，Kenvue 季度销售额低于预期
item.description: Kenvue 周四公布的第三季度销售额略低于华尔街预期，这主要是受到激进对冲基金 Starboard Value 的压力，旗下露得清（Neutrogena）和 Aveeno 品牌的皮肤健康与美容部门业绩疲软的影响。【原文：Kenvue reported third-quarter sales marginally below Wall Street estimates on Thursday, hurt by weakness in its skin health and beauty unit housing the Neutrogena and Aveeno brands, amid pressure from activist hedge fund Starboard Value.】

item.title: 凯雷第三季度利润高于华尔街预期，原因是手续费收入增加
item.description: 私募股权公司凯雷投资集团（Carlyle Group）公布的第三季度利润持平，但超过了华尔街的预期，原因是费用收入的增加被薪酬支出的增加所抵消。【原文：Private equity firm Carlyle Group posted flat third-quarter profits but beat Wall Street's estimates as higher fee income was offset by increased compensation expenses.】

item.title: Moderna 因 COVID 疫苗销售高于预期而意外盈利
item.description: 受成本削减和 COVID-19 疫苗销售额高于预期的推动，Moderna 周四公布了第三季度业绩，尽管其新型呼吸道合胞病毒疫苗的收入较低，但仍实现了意外盈利。【原文：Moderna reported a surprise third-quarter profit on Thursday, driven by cost cutting and higher-than-expected sales of its COVID-19 vaccine, even with low revenue from its new respiratory syncytial virus shot.】

item.title: 庞巴迪第三季度收入增长12%，得益于服务业务的增长
item.description: 庞巴迪（Bombardier）周四称，受公务机零部件和维修需求强劲的帮助，公司第三季度收入增长了12%。【原文：Bombardier said on Thursday its third-quarter revenue rose 12%, helped by strong demand for business jet parts and repairs.】

item.title: 消息人士称，特朗普获胜后，印度对美国公司放开市场准入持开放态度
item.description: 知情人士称，当选总统唐纳德-特朗普长期以来一直指责新德里征收高额关税，如果华盛顿做出回应，印度愿意为美国公司提供更宽松的市场准入。【原文：India is open to offering easier market access for U.S. firms if Washington reciprocates under President-elect Donald Trump, who has long called out New Delhi for its high tariffs, sources aware of the matter said.】

item.title: 早间竞价：美联储和英国央行做出决定，美国众议院翘首以待，德国受挫
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 巴里克黄金公司因产量下降、成本上升导致季度利润不及预期
item.description: 加拿大巴里克黄金公司（Barrick Gold）周四未能达到华尔街对其第三季度利润的预期，原因是其矿山产量下降。【原文：Canada's Barrick Gold missed Wall Street estimates for third-quarter profit on Thursday, weighed down by lower production at its mines.】

item.title: 华尔街以贪婪和惶恐迎接特朗普回归
item.description: 华尔街高管们在分析唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）第二次担任总统的影响时，普遍期待有利于商业的法规，而一些银行家则立即着手讨论潜在的交易。【原文：Wall Street executives by and large are looking forward to business-friendly regulations as they analyze the implications of a second Donald Trump presidency, while some bankers were immediately tasked with discussing potential deals.】

item.title: 高通公司因智能手机市场复苏和中国手机上市而取得进步
item.description: 由于受益于智能手机市场的复苏和中国新手机的推出，高通公司的芯片设计公司预计第一季度业绩将超过华尔街预期，该公司股价周四上涨超过 8%。【原文：Qualcomm's shares rose more than 8% on Thursday after the company forecast first-quarter results ahead of Wall Street estimates as the chip designer benefits from a recovery in the smartphone market and the launch of new Chinese handsets.】

item.title: 美国农民支持特朗普，但面临中国关税威胁的痛苦
item.description: 美国农民希望从当选总统唐纳德-特朗普那里得到一些东西，而他的贸易政策意味着他不太可能做到这一点：增加进入头号大豆进口国中国市场的机会。【原文：U.S. farmers want something from President-elect Donald Trump that his trade policies mean he is unlikely to deliver: increased access to the market of top soy-importer China.】

item.title: 美联储将降息，但特朗普胜选后新格局有待破解
item.description: 美国联邦储备委员会预计将在周四的政策会议结束时把基准政策利率下调四分之一个百分点，考虑到特朗普第二任政府执政后央行可能很快要面对的不确定经济形势，这一决定似乎只是一个脚注。【原文：The U.S. Federal Reserve is expected to reduce its benchmark policy rate by a quarter of a percentage point at the end of its policy meeting on Thursday, a decision that may seem a footnote given the uncertain economic terrain the central bank may soon be navigating under a second Trump administration.】

item.title: 报告称奥迪计划在生产领域外裁员数千人
item.description: 据《经理人》杂志周四报道，德国汽车制造商奥迪正寻求通过裁减生产以外的工作岗位，在中期内缩减其员工队伍，数千个岗位可能面临裁员风险。【原文：German automaker Audi is looking to shrink its workforce in the medium term by cutting jobs outside of production, with thousands of positions at risk, the Manager Magazin reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 业绩预测未能打动投资者，Arm Holdings 股价下跌
item.description: 在美国上市的芯片设计公司Arm Holdings股价盘前下跌6%，原因是该公司的季度业绩预测令投资者失望。【原文：U.S.-listed shares of chip designer Arm Holdings , fell 6% premarket after its quarterly forecast disappointed investors, who had high expectations due to AI-driven interest in chip companies.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）称，大众汽车将因安全气囊问题召回超过 11.4 万辆美国汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局周四表示，大众汽车将在美国召回114478辆汽车，原因是驾驶员侧安全气囊存在问题。【原文：Volkswagen will recall 114,478 vehicles in the United States on concerns over the driver-side airbag, the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Thursday.】

item.title: 期货在特朗普推动的反弹后持稳，美联储利率决议拭目以待
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）令人震惊地第二次重返美国总统宝座所引发的大幅反弹的基础上，美国股票期货在美联储周四做出利率决定之前走高。【原文：U.S. stock futures edged higher ahead of an interest-rate decision by the Federal Reserve on Thursday, building on a sharp rally set off by Donald Trump's stunning comeback as U.S. president for a second time.】

item.title: 亚马逊将向意大利数据中心业务投资 13 亿美元
item.description: 亚马逊计算部门 AWS 周四表示，计划在未来五年内在意大利投资 12 亿欧元（13 亿美元），以进一步扩大其在意大利的数据中心业务。【原文：Amazon's computing unit AWS on Thursday said it planned to invest 1.2 billion euros ($1.3 billion) in Italy over the next five years in a further expansion of its data centre business in the country.】

item.title: 美国农业生产者为特朗普政府打击对华出口做好准备
item.description: 美国农业生产者正在为美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普领导下的新一轮贸易战再次打击对华农产品出口的前景做好准备，但他们表示，尽管任何新的关税都会造成伤害，但他们感觉准备得更好了。【原文：U.S. agriculture producers are bracing for the prospect of a fresh trade war under U.S. President-elect Donald Trump again hitting exports of farm goods to China, but they said while any new tariffs would hurt, they felt better prepared.】

item.title: 意大利 Banco BPM 银行竞购资产管理公司 Anima，提升双方股价
item.description: 意大利第三大银行 Banco BPM 出价收购 Anima Holding 的全部控制权，推动这家基金管理公司的股价周四上涨近 9%。【原文：A bid by Italy's third-largest bank Banco BPM to acquire full control of Anima Holding drove shares in the fund manager nearly 9% higher on Thursday.】

item.title: 报告称，食品公司在贫困国家销售的产品不那么健康
item.description: 一份新的报告显示，全球最大的食品和饮料公司在低收入国家销售的产品平均不如在高收入国家销售的产品健康。【原文：The world’s biggest food and beverage companies on average sell products in low-income countries that are less healthy than what they sell in high-income countries, according to a new report.】

item.title: 空中客车公司 10 月份交付 62 架飞机
item.description: 空中客车公司周四表示，10月份该公司交付了62架飞机，使今年迄今为止的飞机交付总数达到559架。【原文：Airbus delivered 62 aircraft in October to bring the total so far this year to 559, the planemaker said on Thursday.】

item.title: 日产计划裁员 9000 人，年度利润展望下调 70
item.description: 日本日产汽车公司周四宣布了各种成本节约措施，包括裁员9000人，并连续第二次下调了今年的年度展望，因为该公司仍在与中国等主要市场的不利因素作斗争。【原文：Japan's Nissan Motor on Thursday announced various cost saving measures including 9,000 job cuts and slashed its annual outlook for the second straight time this year, as it continues to battle headwinds in major markets such as China.】

item.title: 特朗普胜选令华尔街的中国战略再受质疑
item.description: 业内高管和分析师表示，由于担心唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）担任总统期间的地缘政治紧张局势，更多的美国金融公司可能会撤出中国，将本地部门分拆以尽量降低风险，或暂停扩张计划。【原文：More U.S. financial firms may pull back from China, hive off local units to minimise risks or pause expansion plans on concerns about geopolitical tensions in a Donald Trump presidency, industry executives and analysts said.】

item.title: 亚洲（中国除外）股票创近 2 年半以来最大月度外资流出量
item.description: 由于投资者对美国总统大选结果保持警惕，对企业盈利不及预期、股票估值过高和债券收益率上升的担忧有所反应，除中国以外的亚洲股市在 10 月份出现了外资大幅流出的现象。【原文：Asian equities, excluding China, witnessed sharp foreign outflows in October, as investors wary of the U.S. presidential election outcome reacted to concerns over weaker-than-expected corporate earnings, overvalued stocks and rising bond yields.】

item.title: 以色列签署从波音公司购买 25 架 F-15 战斗机的协议[CHEVRON_LEFT]BA.N[CHEVRON_RIGHT］
item.description: 以色列国防部周四表示，已签署协议从波音公司购买 25 架下一代 F-15 战斗机。【原文：The Israeli defence ministry said on Thursday it had signed an agreement to acquire 25 next generation F-15 fighter jets from Boeing Co .】

item.title: 德国出口和工业产出降幅超预期
item.description: 德国 9 月份的出口和工业产出降幅超过预期，显示出德国经济模式的两大支柱在第四季度初的疲软。【原文：German exports and industrial output fell more than expected in September, showing the weakness of two of the pillars of the German economic model at the start of the fourth quarter.】

item.title: 法航荷航第三季度经营业绩低于预期
item.description: 受巴黎奥运会和单位成本的影响，法航荷航集团周四公布的季度经营业绩降幅大于预期。【原文：Airline group Air France-KLM on Thursday reported a bigger-than-expected drop in its quarterly operating result, impacted by the Paris Olympic Games and unit costs.】

item.title: 由于发动机检查和中东冲突，威兹航空上半年利润下降 33
item.description: 威兹航空公司周四公布，由于发动机检查问题导致空客飞机停飞，以及中东冲突对运营的影响，该公司今年上半年的营业利润下降了 33.2%。【原文：Wizz Air on Thursday posted a 33.2% drop in operating profit for the first half of the year, due to ongoing issues with engine inspections that grounded its Airbus planes and the impact of the Middle East conflict on operations.】

item.title: 英国桑斯伯里百货公司在上半年业绩增长后维持利润展望
item.description: 英国超市集团塞恩斯伯里（Sainsbury's）周四公布了上半年利润增长 3.7%的报告，保持了全年利润增长高达 10%的预期，其中杂货销售的强劲表现被日用百货的疲软表现所抵消。【原文：British supermarket group Sainsbury's on Thursday kept its forecast for full-year profit growth of up to 10% as it reported a 3.7% rise for the first half, with robust grocery sales offset by a weaker performance in general merchandise.】
